def_cn: （用于否定句）任何事物，什么事情
def_en: You use anything in statements with negative meaning to indicate in a general way that nothing is present or that an action or event does not or cannot happen.

def_cn: （用于疑问句或条件从句）任何事物，任何事情
def_en: You use anything in questions and conditional clauses to ask or talk about whether something is present or happening.

def_cn: （用于描述所谈论事物的词语前）…的东西，…的事情
def_en: You can use anything before words which indicate the kind of thing you are talking about.

def_cn: （用于加强语气）无论什么东西，随便什么事情
def_en: You use anything to emphasize a possible thing, event, or situation, when you are saying that it could be any one of a very large number of things.
You use anything in expressions such as anything near ,anything close to and anything like to emphasize a statement that you are making.

def_cn: （限定范围内的）任何一点
def_en: When you do not want to be exact, you use anything to talk about a particular range of things or quantities.

def_cn: （用于形容词后表示强调）非常，十分
def_en: You use as anything after an adjective to emphasize a quality that someone has.

def_cn: 单单除…之外;根本不;远非
def_en: You use anything but in expressions such as anything but quiet and anything but attractive to emphasize that something is not the case.
You can say that you would not do something for anything to emphasize that you definitely would not want to do or be a particular thing.

def_cn: （尤用于否定句后，对所说之事进行补充说明）甚至正相反，甚至还不如说
def_en: You use if anything, especially after a negative statement, to introduce a statement that adds to what you have just said.

def_cn: 或其他什么的；诸如此类
def_en: You can add or anything to the end of a clause or sentence in order to refer vaguely to other things that are or may be similar to what has just been mentioned.
